question.name: PreQuestion_1
question.text: I am more comfortable helping a person who has a physical illness than I am helping a person who has a mental illness.
question.choices: Strongly Agree|Agree|Neither Agree nor Disagree|Disagree|Strongly Disagree

question.name: PreQuestion_2
question.text: If a person with a mental illness complains of physical symptoms (e.g. nausea, back pain or headache), I would likely attribute this to their mental illness.
question.choices: Strongly Agree|Agree|Neither Agree nor Disagree|Disagree|Strongly Disagree

question.name: PreQuestion_3
question.text: If a colleague with whom I work told me they had a managed mental illness, I would be as willing to work with him/her.
question.choices: Strongly Agree|Agree|Neither Agree nor Disagree|Disagree|Strongly Disagree

question.name: PreQuestion_4
question.text: If I were under treatment for a mental illness I would not disclose this to any of my colleagues.
question.choices: Strongly Agree|Agree|Neither Agree nor Disagree|Disagree|Strongly Disagree

question.name: PreQuestion_5
question.text: I would be more inclined to seek help for a mental illness if my treating healthcare provider was not associated with my workplace.
question.choices: Strongly Agree|Agree|Neither Agree nor Disagree|Disagree|Strongly Disagree

question.name: PreQuestion_6
question.text: I would see myself as weak if I had a mental illness and could not fix it myself.
question.choices: Strongly Agree|Agree|Neither Agree nor Disagree|Disagree|Strongly Disagree

question.name: PreQuestion_7
question.text: I would be reluctant to seek help if I had a mental illness.
question.choices: Strongly Agree|Agree|Neither Agree nor Disagree|Disagree|Strongly Disagree

question.name: PreQuestion_8
question.text: Employers should hire a person with a managed mental illness if he/she is the best person for the job.
question.choices: Strongly Agree|Agree|Neither Agree nor Disagree|Disagree|Strongly Disagree

question.name: PreQuestion_9
question.text: I would still go to a physician if I knew that the physician had been treated for a mental illness.
question.choices: Strongly Agree|Agree|Neither Agree nor Disagree|Disagree|Strongly Disagree

question.name: PreQuestion_10
question.text: If I had a mental illness, I would tell my friends.
question.choices: Strongly Agree|Agree|Neither Agree nor Disagree|Disagree|Strongly Disagree

question.name: PreQuestion_11
question.text: It is the responsibility of health care providers to inspire hope in people with mental illness.
question.choices: Strongly Agree|Agree|Neither Agree nor Disagree|Disagree|Strongly Disagree

question.name: PreQuestion_12
question.text: Despite my professional beliefs, I have negative reactions towards people who have mental illness.
question.choices: Strongly Agree|Agree|Neither Agree nor Disagree|Disagree|Strongly Disagree

question.name: PreQuestion_13
question.text: There is little I can do to help people with mental illness.
question.choices: Strongly Agree|Agree|Neither Agree nor Disagree|Disagree|Strongly Disagree

question.name: PreQuestion_14
question.text: More than half of people with mental illness don\u2019t try hard enough to get better.
question.choices: Strongly Agree|Agree|Neither Agree nor Disagree|Disagree|Strongly Disagree

question.name: PreQuestion_15
question.text: People with mental illness seldom pose a risk to the public.
question.choices: Strongly Agree|Agree|Neither Agree nor Disagree|Disagree|Strongly Disagree

question.name: PreQuestion_16
question.text: The best treatment for mental illness is medication.
question.choices: Strongly Agree|Agree|Neither Agree nor Disagree|Disagree|Strongly Disagree

question.name: PreQuestion_17
question.text: I would not want a person with a mental illness, even if it were appropriately managed, to work with children.
question.choices: Strongly Agree|Agree|Neither Agree nor Disagree|Disagree|Strongly Disagree

question.name: PreQuestion_18
question.text: Healthcare providers do not need to be advocates for people with mental illness.
question.choices: Strongly Agree|Agree|Neither Agree nor Disagree|Disagree|Strongly Disagree

question.name: PreQuestion_19
question.text: I would not mind if a person with a mental illness lived next door to me.
question.choices: Strongly Agree|Agree|Neither Agree nor Disagree|Disagree|Strongly Disagree

question.name: PreQuestion_20
question.text: I struggle to feel compassion for a person with a mental illness.
question.choices: Strongly Agree|Agree|Neither Agree nor Disagree|Disagree|Strongly Disagree
